title: When debugging network calls, show the IP address of the response
body: When debugging things on a remote server - especially redirects - it's really handy to know the source IP address of a response.  Chrome's debugging tools show the remote address of a response.  This makes it a heck of a lot easier to find where the response is actually coming from.
